# core-popover

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                | Type                | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ------- |
| `active`    | `active`    | The popover visibility                                     | `boolean`           | `false` |
| `hoverable` | `hoverable` | The popover will show up when hovering the popover-trigger | `boolean`           | `false` |
| `variation` | `variation` | The popover variation.                                     | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `"top"` |
